title.rendered: PlayPark Debuts New Look! Endless Moments Of FUN Await

content.rendered:
PlayPark, a leading online game publisher in Southeast Asia under Asiasoft Corporation Public Company Limited, welcomes the year 2022 with a new logo in the concept of PLAY + Infinite FUN. Through the use of Play buttons that represent ‘play’, as well as an icon design for the endless moment of fun to be had, the new logo reflects the brand identity of PlayPark more clearly.

With a fresh and trendy look, PlayPark is refreshed and renewed in the organization’s Mission. As a brand trusted by gamers for a long time since launching as a Game Portal Website in Thailand back in 2006, PlayPark has now grown into a game publishing giant in Southeast Asia with various game types and has a fan base spanning various ages. By changing the logo, simplicity is emphasized while simultaneously creating better recognition, and showcasing brand identity to reach a wider group of customers.

Besides refreshing the brand to be more modern, PlayPark emphasizes its commitment to bringing Endless moments of FUN to the public with new game roadmaps for both PC and mobile games and upgrading the fun in 2022, thanks to exciting additions to its titles and more await! More exciting still, PlayPark is preparing to step into the game publishing 3.0 era, also known as Play-to-Earn, by applying Blockchain technology and NFT to games to truly meet the lifestyles of the new generation.

Follow PlayPark news via website www.playpark.com or Facebook www.facebook.com/PlayparkLive

excerpt.rendered: PlayPark, a leading online game publisher in Southeast Asia under Asiasoft Corporation Public Company Limited, welcomes the year 2022 with a new logo

title.rendered: NEXON RELEASES ‘MAPLESTORY’ X BLACKPINK COLLABORATION TEASER VIDEO

content.rendered:
In the video, BLACKPINK members share their thoughts and experiences about MapleStory’s fashion, and the in-game items they own. The video also shows them passionately proposing various stand-out ideas during the MapleStory fashion item development process.

Following the teaser video, Nexon plans to release further videos, marked Episode 1 and 2, which contain more stories. Episode 1 will show the BLACKPINK members understanding the MapleStory style trend by guessing the results of the already-held ‘2022 MapleStory Outfit Tournament,’ while Episode 2 will show the BLACKPINK members designing new collaboration items themselves.

This BLACKPINK collaboration video is available both through special web pages and on official YouTube channels in countries with MapleStory and MapleStory M services, such as Singapore, Korea, North America, Taiwan and Japan.

More details about this collaboration event can be found on the official site.

Social Media:
MapleStorySEA: Website / Twitter / Instagram / YouTube / Facebook

About MapleStorySEA https://www.maplesea.com
MapleStorySEA is one of the biggest MMORPGs and the undisputed king of 2D side-scrolling games in Singapore since its launch back in 2005. Players navigate the different continents, and experience an immersive storyline with various quests and missions! Players choose from over 45 different classes, enhance their weapon and equipment to battle monsters with other players.

About PlayPark https://www.playpark.com/
PlayPark, an online game publisher in Southeast Asia under Asiasoft Corporation Public Company Limited, currently has employees in six countries: Thailand, Singapore, Philippines, Malaysia, Indonesia, and Vietnam. PlayPark has launched more than 175 PC and mobile games covering a wide range of genres, including MMORPG, SRPG, Casual, FPS, and MOBA, operating more than 29 live games currently. Other than specializing in in-game service, Asiasoft also understands the different needs and preferences of the markets it is operating in, with a comprehensive team in Southeast Asia. As a result, it contributed to the huge success of launching and operating a variety of games.

About Asiasoft https://www.asiasoft.net/
Over the years, Asiasoft has launched PC games such as Ragnarok (TH), Yulgang Online (TH, VN), Audition (TH, SG, PH, MY), MapleStorySEA (MY, SG), MU Online (TH, SG, PH, MY, ID), Cabal Online (TH, PH), MAT2 (SG, PH, MY), Heroes of the Storm (TH, SG, MY, PH), and mobile games such as Line Dragonica Mobile (TH, SG, PH, MY, ID, VN), Ragnarok Mobile (TH), TS Online Mobile (TH), Club Audition Mobile (SG, PH, MY). With such an impressive portfolio, Asiasoft has gained the confidence of world-class game developers such as Blizzard Entertainment, Sony Online Entertainment, SEGA, CAPCOM, NEXON, Gravity, HanbitSoft to work with us. With 21 years of experience in the gaming industry, Asiasoft has published the most number of MMORPG games in Southeast Asia, with an active player base in the region of more than 7 million IDs.

About NEXON Co., Ltd. https://company.nexon.co.jp/en/
Founded in 1994, NEXON Co., Ltd. (Nexon) (3659.TO) is a company engaged in the production, development and operation of online games and Virtual Worlds. First listed on the Tokyo Stock Exchange in December 2011, Nexon was placed on JPX400 in 2015 and added to the Nikkei Stock Index 300 in 2017. In 2020, Nexon was added to the Nikkei 225. Nexon currently has more than 50 live games on multiple platforms including mobile and available in more than 190 countries. Major game franchises include MapleStory, KartRider and Dungeon&Fighter. In 2021, Nexon completed the acquisition of Embark Studios AB, a company based in Stockholm, Sweden based developing multiple projects for global release.
